content: introducing pink riff a lacy crochet scarf pattern using one skein of fingering weight yarn this pretty scarf works up quickly with basic crochet stitches and an easy 2-row repeat shell pattern add a pop of pink or any contrast yarn at the ends of the scarf for a fun flair this free pattern is simple to follow and creates a stylish scarf with a touch of elegance **measurements** scarf pictured measures 76in 193cm long and 9in 23cm wide after blocking you can find a free version on my blog
